item.title: Matrix Factorization
item.description: Preliminaries Def: A matrix $A \in M_n$ is normal if $AA^∗ = A^∗A$, that is, if $A$ commutes with its conjugate transpose. Def: A complex matrix $A$ is unitary if $AA^∗ = I$ or $A^∗A = I$, and a real matrix $B$ is orthogonal if $BB^T = I$ or $B^TB = I$. There is no so-called "orthonormal" matrix. There is just an orthogonal matrix whose rows or columns are orthonormal vectors.

item.title: 最大熵对应的概率分布
item.description: 最大熵定理 设 $X \sim p(x)$ 是一个连续型随机变量，其微分熵定义为 $$ h(X) = - \int p(x)\log p(x) dx $$ 其中，$\log$ 一般取自然对数 $\ln$, 单位为 奈特（nats）。 考虑如下优
